name: The Case of the Diabolical Triviameister
name_original: The Case of the Diabolical Triviameister
description:
Hamish Scragglethorpe (World Trivia Champion 1932-1987) has a diabolical plan to conquer the world. Luckily for the world, you're here.  You've made it to his lair,  now all you need to do is get your hands on your plans, but that's easier said than done.

The Case of the Diabolical Triviameister is an ARG-style puzzle game, you will be shown a series of images, and you have to work out the password from them using the internet to solve the clues. 

If you're struggling there are extra clues and hints under each picture, and an option to skip to any question you like. Be sure you scroll all the way down.

If you're sure you've got it but it's not being accepted remember to double check spelling (both of the answer and of any codes or links you may have typed), and remember that none of the passwords use capital letters.
